attributes.action: Launch a national enquiry into grooming and rape gangs.
attributes.additional_details: Because local enquiries do not have the same legal powers as a national enquiry.
attributes.background: Launch a full national enquiry into grooming and rape gangs because a series of local enquiries do not have the same legal powers and will not identify any national patterns.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
